lines.text: As Pericles said to the Athenians, "Where do I drain the lizard?".
Louis, what the hell do you think you're doing?
That's not very nice. Lets do something nice for the guy. Lets give Pinkie a convertable
We all know that your major life decisions aren't made in the boardroom, they're made in the bathroom.
You do not talk when I am talking.
Someone aught to tell him what that means in American.
That was lucky. I don't pay lucky.
You can't even burry an eight ball, pinkie
Put your money where your mouth is, Chooch
Hey, hey I was just browsin'
